plot: Where do you hide from danger, when you can not hide anywhere? The little girl Bahar believes she has found a way.
title: Bahar Im Wunderland
plot_es: Where do you hide from danger, when you can not hide anywhere? The little girl Bahar believes she has found a way.
plot_en: Where do you hide from danger, when you can not hide anywhere? The little girl Bahar believes she has found a way.
